channel.title: RuneFocus v2.0 - The days we miss
channel.description:
[img]http://runefocus.netau.net/Images/header.png[/img] [b]RuneFocus[/b] [font=arial][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/www.runefocus.netau.net]RuneFocus[/url] was an [b]RS 2006 remake[/b] attempt, we have done alot of stuff but there's a lot of stuff waiting to be finished too. We were basing only on [b]skills[/b] and [b]basic[/b] stuff, it has a crappy combat system, and some of the skills works as they're supposed to. [b]People that were working on this project are: I Roll Deep, ld est ld, imsuperman05, Native, eyeownyou(I think it's the right), and I'm pretty sure that thats it. We had another guy working on the forums, I can't remember his name, I'll edit this when I remember.[/b] I've start this project on my own idea and for a lot of time I was doing this on my own. Then I was thinking about making a team, and yeah we made it. Alot of them quit since they said that it's to hard for them to work with [b]RuneSource[/b] and stuff. I'm dissapointed that a low number of people use a source like this. [b]Blakeman1892[/b] is the maker of RuneSource, we made a server base that's better then half of them, a server that's major, a server that needs way more attention. We were using [b]~synchronized's [/b]source, based on [b]Azure[/b]. ld est ld was working on the website. I've got the permission from Taharok to post it -> [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/www.runefocus.netau.net]RuneFocus[/url] <-[/font] [hr] [b]I guess I'm done with RSPS stuff. [/b]Maybe I'll be still coding, who knows. I've much more important things to do at the moment instead of coding RSPS's. I'll still be active on the forums as I can, I'll still help someone if he needs help. If I'm going to get back to coding, the first thing I'll finish is xEpicz, and then I'll work on the 194.
[b]Downloads:[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://uppit.com/texg1zrln3hf/RuneFocus_2.0.rar]UppIT[/url][/li][/ul] [code]Fishing Base WoodCutting started from scratch Full Herblore Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP Prayer Fixed the shortbow glitch Fixed ground item stacking Fixed the equipment bug All emotions Teleporting Teleporting with level requirments Eating Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills.. Animation/gfx support Few shops Npc spawns Loads global objects Started a skilling base Messaging Split Chat Wielding Level requirments Yell system PlayerEditor - edits a char file Fletching with interfaces Cooking with Interfaces, almost all raws WoodCutting RuneCrafting Worked on some Fixes Fixed Running(the button packet) Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u can't use fm since I've havent even started the use item Started mining(not tested) Deposit boxes(not finished) Firemaking - re-written Changed the client's theme to the old hunters one Cleaned out the client Added sounds to client Started rewritting RC Improving fishing Improving mining Improving woodcutting fixed some bugs fixed a few glitches Item bonuses(Not finished) worked on some item requirments[/code]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]
[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/8571/pickpocketingc.png[/img] [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/4091/depositbox.png[/img]
Everything else you want to see about the server, pictures and stuff you can find it by checking my v1.5 release.
[hr] Credits:
[ul][li]I Roll Deep[/li] [li]Native[/li] [li]imsuperman05[/li] [li]ld est ld[/li] [li]Envy[/li] [li]Azure[/li] [li]~synchronized[/li] [li]Blakeman1892[/li][/ul]
[hr]

item.title: RuneFocus v2.0 - The days we miss
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

For everyone getting the

[code]
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct com.rs
2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDefinition as it does not have a no-args constru
ctor : Cannot construct com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDefinition as it d
oes not have a no-args constructor
---- Debugging information ----
message : Cannot construct com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDef
inition as it does not have a no-args constructor
cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces
sException
cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDef
inition as it does not have a no-args constructor
class : java.util.ArrayList
required-type : com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDefinition
path : /list/itemDef
line number : 2

    at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshall

er.java:89)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(A
bstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:63)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnm
arshaller.java:76)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnm
arshaller.java:60)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionCon
verter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:71)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.p
opulateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.u
nmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshall
er.java:82)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(A
bstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:63)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnm
arshaller.java:76)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnm
arshaller.java:60)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller
.java:137)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.unmarsh
al(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:923)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:909)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:861)
at com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager.loadItemDefinitions(ItemManager.jav
a:232)
at com.rs2.util.XStreamUtil.loadAllFiles(XStreamUtil.java:65)
at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:107)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException:
Cannot construct com.rs2.model.players.ItemManager$ItemDefinition as it does no
t have a no-args constructor
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflectionProv
ider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:71)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.AbstractReflectionConv
erter.instantiateNewInstance(AbstractReflectionConverter.java:308)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.AbstractReflectionConv
erter.unmarshal(AbstractReflectionConverter.java:161)
at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshall
er.java:82)
… 19 more
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
You need to replace xstream 1.3.1 with a later version http://xstream.codehaus.org/download.html and you may also need to add xmlpull-1.1.3.1 or just use jdk1.6

bstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:63)

a:232)

ider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:71)

er.java:82)

Run it in an IDE (eclipse) Set arguments (-Xmx512m) then direct it to the server (com.rs2) Then run!
